dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Why do you trespass into these lands, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the powers hidden within these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power you seek, power you shall not have. Leave now or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't leave without what I came for.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A stubborn one, are you? Very well, face your doom!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your empty threats amuse me. Farewell, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll retreat, for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice at its finest. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion, I shall leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare for a frosty demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't go down without a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in the face of death. Let us see if it's justified.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll leave, no need for bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, looking for allies in these dark times.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allies... in these lands? Ha! You shall find none here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave without a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall take my leave then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Depart, and trouble us no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a traveler seeking knowledge and seeking no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge seekers are rare in these lands. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the ancient secrets hidden within these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets better left untouched. Leave before you unearth dark forces.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will uncover these secrets, regardless of the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness leads to downfall. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will heed your warning and depart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Depart and forget what you seek.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only knowledge, no harm shall come from me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harm or not, your presence here is a disturbance. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave without the knowledge I seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge at the cost of life? So be it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall respect your wishes and go.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect indeed. Depart while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the inhabitants of these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? We are the challenge. What makes you think you stand a chance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no challenge, prepare to face my strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Confidence, misplaced. Your arrogance shall be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I may have misjudged, I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Depart before you regret your challenge.
